title: 820-00687 no ppdcin.
message:
hi, this macbook came in, dead, but no 20v yet, so i dont jump to cpu bad conclusion ( yeah in the future maybe, but customer wants data )
there's no 5v at ammeter.
ppdcin at r7020and r7010 is 0v.
whole board is pristine, am I looking at some kind of bad mosfet here ?
pointer is appreciated... thanks..
ppdcin isnt shorted.

title: 820-00687 no ppdcin.
message: pin 1 of j9600 USBC_XA_CC1 is shorted at 25 ohm, should be bad cd3215 right ?

title: 820-00687 no ppdcin.
message:
Very likely.
CC1/2 lines are used by charger to detect the MLB.
Is the hardware way to make it sends out 5V in VBUS.

title: 820-00687 no ppdcin.
message:
okayy thankss sir.
cd3215 is the culprit, solved.. (y)
